comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: May be en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gonzalo_de_Quesada_y_Ar%C3%B3stegui In 1914 he was the Cuban minister in Berlin. He had lived in New York and was educated at Columbia and NYU Law School.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.guije.com/libros/proceres/quesadag/index.htm seems to confirm that this picture is of the Cuban diplomat. The picture is clearly of the same man.

comment._content: swanq: Thanks for the additional info. for Quesada.  We'll include it next time we update.
